# 1 Minute Academy
# This file helps LLM tools discover high-level entry points.

Site: http://localhost:5173
Sitemap: http://localhost:5173/sitemap.xml

Primary pages:
- http://localhost:5173/
- http://localhost:5173/topics
- http://localhost:5173/pricing
- http://localhost:5173/faq
